sourcesContent:
// material-ui
import { Button, Grid, IconButton, Tooltip } from '@mui/material';
import { useTheme } from '@mui/material/styles';

// project imports
import MainCard from 'ui-component/cards/MainCard';
import SubCard from 'ui-component/cards/SubCard';
import SecondaryAction from 'ui-component/cards/CardSecondaryAction';
import AnimateButton from 'ui-component/extended/AnimateButton';
import { gridSpacing } from 'store/constant';

// assets
import LayersTwoToneIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LayersTwoTone';
import { IconSettings } from '@tabler/icons';

// ==============================|| FORMS BUTTONS ||============================== //

const UIButton = () => {
    const theme = useTheme();

    return (
        <MainCard title="Button" secondary={<SecondaryAction link="https://next.material-ui.com/components/buttons/" />}>
            <Grid container spacing={gridSpacing}>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Base">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained">Primary</Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" color="secondary">
                                    Secondary
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" disabled>
                                    Disabled
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" href="#contained-buttons">
                                    Link
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Colors">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained">Primary</Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" color="secondary">
                                    Secondary
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button
                                    variant="contained"
                                    sx={{
                                        background: theme.palette.success.dark,
                                        '&:hover': { background: theme.palette.success.main }
                                    }}
                                >
                                    Success
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button
                                    variant="contained"
                                    sx={{ background: theme.palette.error.main, '&:hover': { background: theme.palette.error.dark } }}
                                >
                                    Error
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button
                                    variant="contained"
                                    sx={{
                                        background: theme.palette.warning.dark,
                                        '&:hover': { background: theme.palette.warning.main },
                                        color: 'grey.900'
                                    }}
                                >
                                    warning
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Outlined">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="outlined">Primary</Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="outlined" color="secondary">
                                    Secondary
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="outlined" disabled>
                                    Disabled
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="outlined" href="#contained-buttons">
                                    Link
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="With Icons">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" startIcon={<LayersTwoToneIcon />}>
                                    Button
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" endIcon={<LayersTwoToneIcon />}>
                                    Button
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained">
                                    <LayersTwoToneIcon />
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Size">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" size="small">
                                    Button
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained">Button</Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="contained" size="large">
                                    Button
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Text Button">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="text">Primary</Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="text" color="secondary">
                                    Secondary
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="text" disabled>
                                    Disabled
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button variant="text" href="#contained-buttons">
                                    Link
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Shadow Button">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Button
                                    variant="contained"
                                    sx={{
                                        boxShadow: theme.customShadows.primary,
                                        ':hover': {
                                            boxShadow: 'none'
                                        }
                                    }}
                                >
                                    Primary
                                </Button>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <SubCard title="Animation">
                        <Grid container spacing={2}>
                            <Grid item>
                                <AnimateButton>
                                    <Button
                                        variant="contained"
                                        sx={{
                                            boxShadow: theme.customShadows.primary,
                                            ':hover': {
                                                boxShadow: 'none'
                                            }
                                        }}
                                    >
                                        Default
                                    </Button>
                                </AnimateButton>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <AnimateButton
                                    scale={{
                                        hover: 1.1,
                                        tap: 0.9
                                    }}
                                >
                                    <Button
                                        variant="contained"
                                        color="secondary"
                                        sx={{
                                            boxShadow: theme.customShadows.secondary,
                                            ':hover': {
                                                boxShadow: 'none'
                                            }
                                        }}
                                    >
                                        Scale
                                    </Button>
                                </AnimateButton>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <AnimateButton type="slide">
                                    <Button
                                        variant="contained"
                                        style={{ background: theme.palette.error.main, borderColor: '#EDE7F6' }}
                                        sx={{
                                            boxShadow: theme.customShadows.error,
                                            ':hover': {
                                                boxShadow: 'none'
                                            }
                                        }}
                                    >
                                        Slide
                                    </Button>
                                </AnimateButton>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item>
                                <AnimateButton type="rotate">
                                    <Tooltip title="Rotate">
                                        <IconButton color="primary" size="small">
                                            <IconSettings stroke={1.5} size="1.8rem" />
                                        </IconButton>
                                    </Tooltip>
                                </AnimateButton>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </SubCard>
                </Grid>
            </Grid>
        </MainCard>
    );
};

export default UIButton;
